tidbits.title: Pacific Island Nation
tidbits.description: Kiribati is a Pacific Island nation, comprising 33 atolls and reef islands, known for its stunning marine life and coral atolls.

tidbits.title: Threat from Rising Sea Levels
tidbits.description: The country faces challenges from rising sea levels, making it one of the most vulnerable nations to the impacts of climate change.

tidbits.title: Cultural Traditions
tidbits.description: Kiribati holds rich cultural traditions, including music, dance, and unique skills like navigating by the stars using traditional methods.
